title: 5 GB of "Audio files" not shown in Settings
content:
There is a section in the Settings menu (Settings > Storage > Music & audio > Audio files) where an item labeled "Audio files" is taking up 5.65 GB, shown in the following screenshot: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wrpd672YGLVN_aSw7TP4lxCKctGNrqFo/view?usp=sharing

After clicking into it to see what is taking up that space, it shows me the following empty screen: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-29Z_OlCnbIndAxgTyisYSAn0rjCj_Ge/view?usp=sharing

Does anyone know what could be causing this?
